Getting started

Welcome to your online speaking course. This course is a mixture of studying online lessons with your Tutor and some self study lessons. Please use this course to book all your online speaking lessons.

Get Skype
Enter Skype ID

Get Skype for your online lessons

Our teachers use Skype to contact you for booked lessons. In order for teachers to contact you for a lesson you need to install Skype.

If you don't have Skype please install it from here

Lesson 1
Good Food
Grammar
PDF
Simon
Fri 2 July 2016
Book/Topic:ReallyEnglish - EZ to Talk Basic.5 - Taking Business Trips Vocabulary/Expressions: 1. Nigel is staying at the Holiday Inn. 2. My assistant is meeting our client at the airport now. 3. Your secretary is booking your tickets now. 4. Our clients are taking us out to dinner now. 5. She is traveling to London at the moment. Focus: 1. Present Continuous: be + verb + -ing for actions happening now or around now 2. Expressing ideas based on the language focus 3. Constructing sentences using the expressions 4. Practice the expressions in different situations Next topic:EZ to Talk – Basic.6 Good food Evaluation: Remarks: Book/Topic:ReallyEnglish - EZ to Talk Basic.6 - Good food Vocabulary/Expressions: 1. delicious: >> This cake is delicious. 2. fresh: >> I like to eat fresh food. 3. healthy: >> That meal looks healthy. 4. fried: >> I am trying not to eat fried food. 5. boiled: >> I have heard that boiled carrots are healthier than raw carrots. 6. plate: >> That plate of food looks wonderful. 7. taste: >> How does it taste? 8. fast food: >> Sometimes fast food is the only option for lunch. 9. microwave meal: >> I bought a microwave meal for dinner. 10. drink: >> What drink would you like? Focus: 1. Expressing ideas based on the language focus 2. Constructing sentences using the expressions 3. Practice the expressions in different situations Next topic:EZ to Talk – Basic.7 Healthy habits Evaluation: Remarks:
